欓字的基本解释

欓
dǎng
食茱萸，落叶乔木，枝上多有刺，羽状复叶，果实球形，成熟时红色，可以入药。
木桶：“始以榆欓盛经，白马负图，表之中夏，故以白马为寺名。”

欓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎng］
［《廣韻》多朗切，上蕩，端。］
果木名。即食茱萸。芸香科。落叶乔木，有刺。果实红色，可入药。果油味辛香，可供佐食调味用。
[②]［tǎng］
［《集韻》坦朗切，上蕩，透。］
盛物器。桶。

欓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　欓； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页564第04
【唐韻】多朗切【集韻】【韻會】底朗切，?音黨。【玉篇】茱萸類。【集韻】越茮也。【爾雅翼】三香：椒、欓、薑也。【韻會】欓出閩中、江東。【集韻】通作?。　又【類篇】坦朗切，音惝。木桶也。

Basic explanation of words
Zhan
dǎng
Edible cornel, deciduous tree, many thorns on the branches, pinnate compound leaves, spherical fruit, red when mature, can be used as medicine.
Wooden barrel: "The elmwood was first used to hold the scriptures, and the white horse was negative, and the middle of the summer was shown, so the white horse was the name of the temple."
Zhan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎng］
["Guang Yun" Duo Lang cut, swing, end. ]
Fruit tree name. Ready-to-eat cornel. Rutaceae. Deciduous tree with thorns. The fruit is red and can be used as medicine. The fruit oil is spicy and can be used for seasoning.
[②]［tǎng］
["Ji Yun" is frank and cut, up and down, and through. ]
Container. barrel.
